basics.name: Seifeddine Touj
basics.label: Software Engineering Student
basics.summary: Passionate Software Engineering Student with a focus on full-stack development and extensive experience in web applications, team leadership, and strategic planning.

work.name: Aidodev
work.summary: Contributed to InfiniteBlocks, a platform for AI-powered podcast generation and sentiment analysis in cryptocurrency news.
highlights: Developed microservices and managed the microservice hub for optimal performance.
Integrated Auth0 for authentication with decentralized login methods (Ethereum, Solana).
responsibilities: Developed microservices to enhance application modularity and scalability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement decentralized authentication.
achievements: Successfully implemented decentralized login, improving security for over 100 daily users.

work.name: AgroBourse 360°SI
work.summary: Focused on feature creation, integration, and troubleshooting in Synapse HR Solution, an HR management app.
highlights: Adapted the app to meet evolving user needs through client feedback integration.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services to support HR functionality.
Collaborated with stakeholders to adjust features based on client feedback.
achievements: Enhanced HR app usability, resulting in a 15% increase in customer satisfaction.

work.name: AgroBourse 360°SI

Worked in a cross-functional team to prototype solutions based on user research.

projects.name: Synapse HR Solution
projects.description: A robust platform revolutionizing human resources management, covering employee attendance, leave management, productivity tracking, recruitment, and skill enhancement.

responsibilities: Gathered requirements and designed scalable database schemas
Implemented core functionality with Python, Odoo, and Docker
Led agile development sprints and ensured timely feature delivery
achievements: Improved HR efficiency through feature integration
Enhanced stakeholder satisfaction by iterating based on feedback
